condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Communities, particularly in rural areas, use sustained resilient “basic” water supply services free from contamination

description.narrative: Rural water supply progress is stalling, no doubt due in large part to limited investment in strengthening capacity of national and district levels as well as private operators and communities. More investment and technical expertise are needed to develop a comprehensive approach to climate resilient, sustainable and safe water services in rural areas. UNICEF has taken a key step to improve capacity and regulation of the rural water private operators. UNICEF continues to play a key role in supporting the Government to improve WASH/IPC implementation for COVID-19 and beyond. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:07/08/2020
